1194:15: vyācaṣṭe vacasā sphuṭena laghunā mando'pi ratnākāraḥ
1194:19: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ nidānaṃ avadānaṃ itivṛttakaṃ jātakaṃ vaipulyaṃ adbhutā dharmāḥ upadeśāśceti|
1194:24: yacca neyārthaṃ sūtraṃ tadapi geyaṃ gamyatvāt|
1194:27: yacca nītārthaṃ sūtraṃ tena hi [sphuṭābhiprāyeṇa] vyākhyānāt|
1194:29: yatra [dvipadā tripadā catuṣpadā pañcapadā] ṣaṭpadā ca|
1194:67: yata ādau trividhā sarvajñatā tat ‘lakṣaṇaṃ’ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ|
1194:68: tataścatvāro'syāḥ prayogaḥ prayogaprakarṣaḥ prayogānukramaḥ prayoganiṣṭhā ceti| ........|
1194:77: tadevamaṣṭau ṣaṭ trayo vā'sya sūtrasyārthāḥ sākalyena|
1194:92: yathā yathā ceyamadhimacyate tathā tathā bodherāsannībhavati|
1194:94: aṣṭāsu cābhisamayeṣu yathā [sāraṃ tatheyaṃ] vistareṇocyamānā kathaṃ prādhānyena nocyate ?
1194:107: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā [śrutaṃ mayā] iti saṅgītikāraḥ aḍakavatīnivāsī vajrapāṇirmahābodhisattvaḥ|
1194:108: sa hi bhādrakalpikānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ rūpakāyasya dharmakāyasya ca rakṣādhikṛtaḥ pṛṣṭhato'vagataḥ|
1194:116: yato'syāṃ bodhipakṣyasatya[pratītya] samutpādālambano nirnimittavihāra ābhogavāhī tasmāddūraṃgamā|
1194:123: “dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣamā vīrya dhyānaṃ prajñā upāyatā|
1194:125: tatra yatpāramitopacitasya kuśalamūlasyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau samyakpariṇāmanamupādāya pāramitā tenopāyena tasyākṣayīkaraṇāt|
1194:134: parikarmāṇi punarāsāṃ mahatyorbhagavatyoruddiṣṭāni nirdiṣṭāni ca bhūmīnāṃ parikarmāṇyadhikṛtya śāstre trayoviṃśatiḥ ślokāḥ|
1194:156: [8] śīlaṃ kṛtajñatā kṣāntiḥ prāmodyaṃ mahatī kṛpā|
1194:165: [9] atṛptatā śrute dānaṃ dharmasya ca nirāmiṣam|
1194:206: kṛśo'pi nārthināṃ kṣeptā ṣaṣṭhīṃ bhūmiṃ samaśnute||1-58||
1194:207: ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ pratyekaṃ pūraka iti ṣaḍdharmāḥ|
1194:212: daurbalyepi na yācakānāṃ kṣepa iti trayaḥ|
1194:225: [21] śamathasya ca nidhyaptiḥ kauśalaṃ ca vidarśane|
1194:233: paripūrṇāḥ sa saptamīṃ bhūmiṃ prāpnotīti samāsato'rthaḥ|
1194:319: yena jñānena sā jñeyā daśamī bodhisattvabhūḥ||1-70||
1194:332: etā navabhūmīratikramya yena jñānena bodhisattvo buddhabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bhavati sā daśami bodhisattvabhūmiḥ|
1194:345: tatra darśanamārge tathatādīnāṃ rūpādīnāṃ svapnādīnāṃ ca grāhyavastūnāmupalambho vikalpaḥ|
1194:352: bhāvanāmārge tu na sthitā nāsthitāḥ sarvadharmā asthānayogena|
1194:383: avarṇasaṃsthānamapratighamanirdarśanamanantamamadhyanna hīyate na vardhate notpadyate na nirudhyate na kāmadhātuparyāpannaṃ na rūpadhātuparyāpannaṃ nārūpyadhatuparyāpannam|
1194:394: kathaṃ ca tāvatāmavakāśaḥ yataḥ sattvāsattayā ākāśāsattā|
1194:397: iti hi sattvāścākāśaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ ca sarvadharmāścārūpiṇo'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇāḥ|
1194:406: yatasteṣāṃ prakṛtirna kvacidgacchati na kutaścidāgacchati na kvacittiṣṭhati|
1194:425: na ca śūnyatā atītā va anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā|
1194:426: na tasyāṃ saṃkleśa upalabhyate na vyavadānam|
1194:432: yānaśabdārthanirdeśe subhūteḥ sādhukāraṃ datvā atra śikṣitvetyādinā prāptiniryāṇaṃ praratauti|
1194:437: anulomaṃ nirdiśasi iti tvaṃ hi arvadharmān mahāyānaniḥsvabhāvān nirdiśasi|
1194:440: api tu khalu punarityādinā prakṛtameva prāptiniryāṇamadhikṛtya tasyāṃ pāptau dvādaśaviśeṣān dvādaśabhirvākyairāha|
1194:454: kalpiteṣu anabhiniveśābhyāsaniṣṭhāyāṃ tadabhiniveśajanmanaḥ parantatrasya sarvathā nivṛttau sarvākarajñatā bodhisattvena prāpyata iti samudāyārthaḥ|
1194:456: uktaṃ bhagavatā “atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattva mahāsattvāḥ sarvākārajñatāmanuprāptā anuprāpsyanti anuprāpnuvanti ceti|
1194:457: tatra na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānto na madhyaḥ|
1194:458: tato na sattvā na sarvadharmā na bodhisattvaḥ” iti|
1194:459: sattvāśca sarvadharmāśca bodhisattvaśca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni ca sarvametadadvaidhīkāram|
1194:470: yasmāt idamapi na vidyate nopalabhyate rūpādi śūnyatāmupādāya|
1194:471: na hi śūnyatāyā rūpādikamasti nāpi bodhisattva iti tṛtīyasyārthaḥ||
1194:476: sarveṇa sarvamiti sarvayathā bhavati pūrṇāvayavatvād vargāṇām|
1194:478: sarvaṃ sarvatheti svena svena itaretaraiśca sarvairanupalabhamānaḥ|
1194:489: evameva vādābhāva anuṣṭhānābhāvānna kascinna kenacinna kvacitprāpnotīti caturthasyārthaḥ||
1194:499: ato'nabhinivṛttena bodhisattvanāmnā anabhinirvṛttaṃ sarvākārajñatā nāma na prāpyata iti pañcamasyārthaḥ|
1194:500: evaṃ tāvatpañcabhirvākyairdharmanairātmyamukhena nāmadheyamukhena ca kalpitasya prāptiḥ pratiṣiddhā|
1194:502: yathā ātmā ātmeti ca bhagavannucyate ātyantatayā ca bhagavannanabhinirvṛtta ātmeti|
1194:506: yathāśabdāt prakaraṇācca gamyate tatha sarvadharmā bodhisattvaśceti||
1194:509: kutaḥ etat ? yato mahatyorbhagavatyordvādaśabhirebhirvākyairuddeśaḥ subhūtinā kṛte tata eṣāṃ dvādaśānāmabhidhānakāraṇapraśneṣu śariputreṇa kṛteṣu thavirasubhūtiḥ kāraṇāni krameṇa bruvāṇaḥ saptamasthānakena kāraṇena ‘abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti’ praśnamanudyābhāvasvabhāvatāyāṃ kāraṇamuktvā ‘anena paryāyeṇa,
1194:513: subhūteḥ praśnānuvādakāraṇākhyānatadupasaṃhārā iha jñāpakā na tūddeśaḥ|
1194:515: yataḥ saptamavākye trayo viplavāḥ kālena jātāḥ|
1194:517: ekavākyatārthe prathamāṃ vibhaktimapanīya ṣaṣṭhivibhaktiḥ kṛteti dvitīyo viplavaḥ|
1194:518: abhāvasvabhāvatāṃ cāpanīya asvabhāvata paṭhiteti tṛtīyo viplavaḥ|
1194:520: evamiti paratantreṇa svabhāvena abhāvasvabhāva eṣāmiti abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ|
1194:524: saṃyogiko yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so'bhāvaḥ kāraṇaviyoge satyabhāvāt|
1194:527: na ca vidyamānasya paścādabhāvo ghaṭate virodhāt|
1194:528: tasmādekakṣaṇa eva yo bhāvaḥ sa ekakṣaṇāntareṣvabhāvaḥ|
1194:530: kiṃ ca, yadanityaṃ tat duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca prahātavyam|
1194:532: tasmātparatantreṇāpi svabhāvena bodhisattvo na prāpnotīti saptamasyārthaḥ||
1194:534: yataḥ kulālāda ghaṭaḥ kuvindātpaṭa utpadyamāno dṛśyate|
1194:540: ata eva nirdeśavākye subhūtinā yuktiruktā-asaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ saṃskarturabhāvāditi|
1194:543: asyāṃ tu bhagavatyāṃ grāhyatāpi kalpitasya pratiṣiddhā|
1194:545: aṣṭamādūrdhvaṃ trīṇī vākyāni pariniṣpannaṃ svabhāvamadhikṛtya evamityādi|
1194:546: evamiti kalpitena svabhāvena eteṣāmiti paratnatrarūpāṇāṃ yā asvabhāvatā śūnyatā sā'nabhinirvṛttiriti|
1194:548: yadyevaṃ tadā dharmatāyā dharmādavyatirekād bhrāntikṣaye śūnyatāpi kṣīyeta|
1194:549: atha śūnyatā śāśvatī tadā tadavyatirekād bhrāntikṣaye śūnyatāpi kṣīyeta|
1194:550: atha śūnyatā śāśvatī tadā tadavyatirekād bhrāntirapi śāsva(śva)
1194:553: yatpariniṣpannaṃ rūpaṃ na te bhrāntisvabhāvāḥ paratantrā dharmā ityarthaḥ|
1194:564: nirvṛttāyāṃ ca bhrāntau prāptistadā ka āśrayaḥ śūnyatāyāḥ ?
1194:565: atha nirāśrayā na tarhi kasyacit dharmatā|
1194:582: sa cedityata ārabhya tatkasya hetorityataḥ prāk|
1194:583: atra cittaṃ nāvalīyata ityādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ padaiḥ śamathasya pañcākārā ucyante|
1194:588: atastaireva caturbhiḥ pṛṣṭhabhaṅgapratiṣedhāt na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati mānasam|
1194:594: na santrasyati na santrāsamāpadyata iti padadvayena yuganaddho mārgaḥ|
1194:595: tathā hi na saṃtrasyatīti na samādhestrasyati tadatyāgāditi śamathāṅgaḥ|
1194:609: rūpaṃ kalpitaṃ yāvadvijñānaṃ yāvadbuddhadharmān nopaitīti nopalabhate,
1194:615: pūrvvamutpanno rūpādiridānīṃ niruddha iti na paśyati|
1194:622: tau tarhyanutpādavyayau tasya svabhāvau abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti paratantraṃ svabhāvamadhikṛtya vacanāt|
1194:631: nanu tadānīṃ rūpāderabhāvādadvayībhāvo na yukta ityata āha|
1194:641: katamo bodhisattvaḥ katamā sarvākārajñatā katamā prajñāpāramitā katamā upaparīkṣaṇeti|
1194:643: tayā bodhyā yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvākārajñānaṃ nirabhiniveśaṃ sā tatra sarvākārajñatā|
1194:649: tebhyo'pyāratā viratā yā prajñā seha prajñāpāramitā|
1194:650: yatsarvadharmānnityasukhātmaśāntaśūnyanimittapraṇihitaviviktānāṃ pratyekaṃ tadviparītānāṃ ca ṣoḍaṣānāmārāṇāṃ pratiṣedhena vyupaparīkṣate|
1194:654: evaṃ bhagavannityataḥ prabhṛti atha khalvāyuṣmān ityataḥ prāk|
1194:670: yāni duḥkhāni karacaraṇaśiraḥ śarīradānāni satvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvānāmarthāya tāni vā pratyanubhavituṃ kasmādutsaheta|
1194:671: saṃnāhavīryeṇāpi tadā duṣkaracārikāṃ na carenna vādyavaset|
1194:677: yo hi duṣkaracārikāmicchati tasya sā na syādityaniṣṭāpādanaṃ doṣaḥ syāt|
1194:689: sarveṇa sarvamiti sarva yathā bhavati tisṛbhirduḥkhātābhiḥ|
1194:693: yathā ātmā na vidyate sarveṇeti ātmasattvajīvapoṣapuruṣādibhedena|
1194:698: prativargaṃ samastebhyo vyastebhyaśca yathā ātmā tathā sarvadharmā na vidyante|
1194:699: sarveṇeti skandhadhātvādivargabhedena sarveṇa sarva yathā bhavati|
1194:701: punaḥsarva yathā bhavati prativarga te sarva ityarthaḥ|
1194:703: sarveṣu prabhedeṣu ātmani pareṣu ca samastavyasteṣvityarthaḥ|
1194:707: duṣkaracārikāyā apyanutpāda eva tattvaṃ tadeva tattvaṃ paśyatā sā caritavyā yatāsau śaktā ca bhavenmahāphalā ca|
1194:709: sarvākārasarvadharmavikalpaprabiṣedhāya hetuḥ sthaviro yadapyāyuṣmān ityetadārabhya sannihitādevamuktaḥśabdāt prāk|
1194:712: evamukta ityata ārabhya atyaṃtaṃ pratibhātīti yāvat|
1194:713: sarvajñateti sarvākārajñatā anuprāptaiva bhavatītyādita eva sarveṣāṃ dharmadhātumātratvāt dharmadhātośca prakṛtyaiva sarvathā viśuddhatvāditi bhāvaḥ|
1194:721: sarva eva dharmo'nutpāda ityasmin pakṣe hyeṣaḥ prasaṅgaḥ|
1194:722: tatra anutpannena bodhisattvena anutpannā sarvākārajñatā nāpi prāpyate|
1194:731: anutpanno dharmaḥ paścādutpanno vā syāt paścādanutpanna eva vā|
1194:733: ādye tu vikalpe dharmadhātorutpattivirodha iti bhāvaḥ|
1194:734: tasmādubhayoranutpādāt sādhūktaṃ nāpyanutpannena dharmeṇānutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyata iti yuktaḥ prāptivikalpapratiṣedhaḥ|
1194:736: sa ca prakṛtiprabhāsvaratvādanādinidhanatvācca na prāpyate nāpi prāpnoti,
1194:744: tena teṣāṃ kṣaye sati tatra kṣayalakṣaṇā viśuddhirapūrvatvāt prāpyate|
1194:748: sarvavibhramanivṛttau ca suviśuddhasarvadharmadharmatājñānalakṣaṇā sarvākārajñatā yāpūrvatvāvdodhisattvena labhyate|
1194:749: saiva tasyā viśuddherātmabhūtāyāḥ saṃvedanāprāptyabhisamayaḥ saṃpadyata iti siddhāntaḥ|
1194:761: tatrādye pakṣe anutpannāyāḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ kutaḥ prāptiḥ ?
1194:767: nāsau pratibhāti jalpituṃ na rocate vaktum|
1194:768: sarvadharmaśūnyatālambane cittasantāne yaiva sarvabhrāntīnāṃ nivṛttiḥ saiva sarvākārajñatāyā utpattiḥ|
1194:782: trayametadanutpāda eva sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dharmatāśarīreṇaiva sarvadharmāṇāṃ tasyāṃ pratibhāsāditi bhāvaḥ|
1194:785: evamukta ityādinā śāriputraḥ prakṛtameva subhūtervacanaṃ praśaṃsanmārganiryāṇaprastāvanāṃ karoti|
1194:787: yato yata eveti yatra yatraiva sthāne niḥsarati uttarati na calati na bhraśyati na vi[ro]dhayati na vyākulayati|
1194:789: evaṃ prastāvanāyāṃ kṛtāyāṃ etad iti mārganiryāṇe|
1194:793: atreti anantaroktā sarvadharmā'niśritā cāsau paramatvātpāramitā ca|
1194:803: kathamāyuṣmannityādi vikalpakaṃ manasikāraṃ matvā śāriputrasyāyaṃ praśno manasikāreṇa viharantīti yāvat|
1194:804: tata ūrdhvaṃ evamukta ityādinā subhūteḥ sādhukārapūrvakaṃ vacanam|
1194:810: bhūtapadābhidhāneneti vikalpamanasikārasya viparyayo bhūtapadaṃ bhūtaṃ vastu|
1194:838: [āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ] sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāṃ prathamaḥ parivartaḥ||
